Detailed Description

In this file are implemented all the functions that allows to pass from the joint space to the position and orientation space, and vice versa.

◆ inverse_kinematics()

vector<JointStateVector> inverse_kinematics ( PositionVector  pos,
RotationMatrix  RotationMatrix 
)

Transform from the operational space, which is specified in terms of position and orientation of the end-effector , to the joint angles space.

Parameters
posposition you want to bring into the joint space ( associated with the rotation )
RotationMatrixorientation we want to bring into the joint space ( associated with the position )
Returns
** vector<JointStateVector>
